tit.cmt: 原文に合せて読みに修正しました。

sen.j: イクラ（ ；ikra）とはサケの魚卵。
sen.e: Ikura is salmon roe.
Ikura is salmon roe.
Ikura is salmon roe.

sen.j: 筋子の卵巣膜（卵を包む薄い膜）を取り除き、産卵前の熟した卵を1粒ずつに分けた物を特に指して呼ぶ。
sen.e: It particularly refers to the eggs harvested from salmon just before spawning and that have been removed from the membrane.
It particularly refers to the eggs harvested from salmon just before spawning and that have been removed from the membrane.
It particularly refers to the eggs harvested from salmon just before spawning and that have been removed from the membrane.

sen.j: バラ子とも呼ばれる。
sen.e: Another name for ikura (salmon roe) is barako.
Another name for ikura (salmon roe) is barako.
Another name for ikura (salmon roe) is barako.

sen.j: 一般的には加熱加工せず、塩漬けや醤油漬けにして食べる。
sen.e: Usually they are not cooked or processed, but eaten after pickling in brine or soya sauce.
Usually they are not cooked or processed, but eaten after pickling in brine or soya sauce.
Usually they are not cooked or processed, but eaten after pickling in brine or soya sauce.

sen.j: 概要
sen.e: Outline
Outline
Outline

sen.j: 語源はロシア語で、「魚卵」・「小さくて粒々したもの」という意味である。
sen.e: The term ikura is derived from the Russian word 'ikra' which means roe or small round things.
The term ikura is derived from the Russian word 'ikra' which means roe or small round things.
The term ikura is derived from the Russian word 'ikra' which means roe or small round things.

sen.j: ロシア語ではキャビアもたらこもすべてイクラであるが、日本ではサケ類の卵をばらした物のみを指す。
sen.e: In Russian, caviar and cod roe are also called 'ikra' however in Japan ikura refers only to salmon roe.
In Russian, caviar and cod roe are also called 'ikra' however in Japan ikura refers only to salmon roe.
In Russian, caviar and cod roe are also called 'ikra' however in Japan ikura refers only to salmon roe.

sen.j: サケの卵はロシアでは「赤いイクラ」（ ）と呼ばれる。
sen.e: Salmon eggs are called 'red ikra' in Russian.
Salmon eggs are called 'red ikra' in Russian.
Salmon eggs are called 'red ikra' in Russian.

sen.j: 一方、「黒いイクラ」（ ）はキャビアのことである。
sen.e: On the other hand, 'black ikra' refers to caviar.
On the other hand, 'black ikra' refers to caviar.
On the other hand, 'black ikra' refers to caviar.

sen.j: ロシア式サケの卵の食べ方が日本に伝わったのは大正時代で、ロシアから伝えられた製法を樺太庁水産試験場が保存の利く塩蔵品を試験的に製造したのが始まりであった。
sen.e: The Russian way of eating salmon roe entered Japan in the Taisho Period when the Karafuto Prefecture (now Sakhalin) Fisheries Experimental Station test produced a salt cured product based on the manufacturing method from Russia.

The Russian way of eating salmon roe entered Japan in the Taisho Period when the Karafuto Prefecture (now Sakhalin) Fisheries Experimental Station test produced a salt cured product based on the manufacturing method from Russia.

The Russian way of eating salmon roe entered Japan in the Taisho period when the Karafuto Prefecture (now Sakhalin) Fisheries Experimental Station test produced a salt cured product based on the manufacturing method from Russia.

sen.j: 現在ではやや甘口の醤油漬けが主流になり、イクラ丼やイクラの寿司として使われている。
sen.e: Now salmon roe is usually eaten with a little sweet soya sauce and is often used in dishes such as salmon roe on rice (ikura-don) or in sushi.
Now salmon roe is usually eaten with a little sweet soya sauce and is often used in dishes such as salmon roe on rice (ikura-don) or in sushi.
Now salmon roe is usually eaten with a little sweet soya sauce and is often used in dishes such as salmon roe on rice (ikura-don) or in sushi.

sen.j: 日本においてはサケの卵が主流であるが、ロシアで使用されるのはカラフトマス（ピンクサーモン）の卵であり、これを原料とした物を日本では特にマスコ、マスイクラとして区別する場合がある。
sen.e: In Japan the most common roe is salmon roe however in Russia they use the roe of pink salmon (karafuto-masu), and products made with pink salmon in Japan are distinguished by names such as 'masu-ko' or 'masu-ikura'.

In Japan the most common roe is salmon roe however in Russia they use the roe of pink salmon (karafuto-masu), and products made with pink salmon in Japan are distinguished by names such as 'masu-ko' or 'masu-ikura'.

In Japan the most common roe is salmon roe however in Russia they use the roe of pink salmon (karafuto-masu), and products made with pink salmon in Japan are distinguished by names such as 'masu-ko' or 'masu-ikura.'
sen.cmt: ピリオドの位置を訂正しました。

sen.j: その他の魚卵を使った際の別名は名称は「筋子」の項を参照の事。
sen.e: For the different names used for roe from other varieties of fish please refer to the item 'sujiko' (roe).
For the different names used for roe from other varieties of fish please refer to the item 'sujiko' (roe).
For the different names used for roe from other varieties of fish please refer to the item 'sujiko' (roe).

sen.j: 筋子はたらこの様に粒が薄膜に包まれているのではなく、すべての粒がごく薄い膜でつながっている。
sen.e: Sujiko roe is roe that is left in the sack whereas cod roe has been removed from the sack.
Sujiko roe is roe that is left in the sack whereas cod roe has been removed from the sack.
Sujiko roe is roe that is left in the sack whereas cod roe has been removed from the sack.

sen.j: この為、これをイクラに加工するには、ラケットのような目の粗い網の上に抑えつけて揉む必要がある。
sen.e: Therefore, to process sujiko into ikura (salmon roe) it is necessary to rub it over a fine net like a racket.
Therefore, to process sujiko into ikura (salmon roe) it is necessary to rub it over a fine net like a racket.
Therefore, to process sujiko into ikura (salmon roe) it is necessary to rub it over a fine net like a racket.

sen.j: 未熟卵はまだ皮が弱く、この工程に適しておらず、ある程度成熟した物がイクラの加工に適した物となる。
sen.e: The membrane of the immature eggs is still soft and not suitable for this processing method, which is more suited to mature eggs.
The membrane of the immature eggs is still soft and not suitable for this processing method, which is more suited to mature eggs.
The membrane of the immature eggs is still soft and not suitable for this processing method, which is more suited to mature eggs.

sen.j: ただし、すでに河川に入り遡上をはじめた魚の物は、ほぼ完全に卵がほぐれて、ゴムまりのように硬くなっており食用には適さない。
sen.e: However, the eggs of fish that have already returned to rivers and started to swim upriver are virtually about to be let go and are very hard and not suitable for eating.
However, the eggs of fish that have already returned to rivers and started to swim upriver are virtually about to be let go and are very hard and not suitable for eating.
However, the eggs of fish that have already returned to rivers and started to swim upriver are virtually about to be let go and are very hard and not suitable for eating.

sen.j: サケは産卵のために、北太平洋のカムチャツカあたりから南へ下ってくる。
sen.e: Salmon head south from the northern pacific around Kamchatka when it is time to spawn.
Salmon head south from the northern pacific around Kamchatka when it is time to spawn.
Salmon head south from the northern pacific around Kamchatka when it is time to spawn.

sen.j: 北海道では8月後半から9月初めにかけて、秋鮭漁が解禁となる。
sen.e: In Hokkaido the ban on salmon fishing is lifted between the end of August and the beginning of September.
In Hokkaido the ban on salmon fishing is lifted between the end of August and the beginning of September.
In Hokkaido the ban on salmon fishing is lifted between the end of August and the beginning of September.

sen.j: 11月になると三陸海岸や新潟県でも漁は本格化する。
sen.e: Fishing begins in earnest in the pacific side of northern Japan and also in Niigata in November.
Fishing begins in earnest in the pacific side of northern Japan and also in Niigata in November.
Fishing begins in earnest in the pacific side of northern Japan and also in Niigata in November.

sen.j: 解禁となった当初は、未熟卵であり、粒が小さく皮も弱い。
sen.e: At the beginning of the open fishing season, the eggs are immature and small with weak membranes.
At the beginning of the open fishing season, the eggs are immature and small with weak membranes.
At the beginning of the open fishing season, the eggs are immature and small with weak membranes.

sen.j: この時期の卵は、イクラに揉むことはもちろん、冷凍さえも難しい。
sen.e: Eggs harvested at this time are not only difficult to process but even to freeze.
Eggs harvested at this time are not only difficult to process but even to freeze.
Eggs harvested at this time are not only difficult to process but even to freeze.

sen.j: 粒の皮が弱いため、冷凍したときに皮が破れやすいからである。
sen.e: This is because the membranes are weak and fall apart when frozen.
This is because the membranes are weak and fall apart when frozen.
This is because the membranes are weak and fall apart when frozen.

sen.j: この時期のものは、主に筋子として流通される。
sen.e: Roe harvested at this time is mainly sold as sujiko.
Roe harvested at this time is mainly sold as sujiko.
Roe harvested at this time is mainly sold as sujiko.

sen.j: 産地によって成熟時期に差異はあるが平均的に10月くらいになると、卵が成熟してきて、イクラに適した状態になってくる。
sen.e: There is a little variation in the maturing period between the spawning regions, however on average in around October the eggs are mature and suitable for processing into ikura (salmon roe).
There is a little variation in the maturing period between the spawning regions, however on average in around October the eggs are mature and suitable for processing into ikura (salmon roe).
There is a little variation in the maturing period between the spawning regions, however on average in around October the eggs are mature and suitable for processing into ikura (salmon roe).

sen.j: 11月頃になるとさらに卵は成熟する。
sen.e: By November the eggs are even more mature.
By November the eggs are even more mature.
By November the eggs are even more mature.

sen.j: 粒はさらに大きくなり、皮が堅くなってくる。
sen.e: The eggs are bigger and the membrane a little harder.
The eggs are bigger and the membrane a little harder.
The eggs are bigger and the membrane a little harder.

sen.j: さらに成熟が進むと、粒の皮が堅くなりすぎて、食べたときに口に残るようになる。
sen.e: If they mature further, the egg membrane will become too hard and remain in the mouth when eaten.
If they mature further, the egg membrane will become too hard and remain in the mouth when eaten.
If they mature further, the egg membrane will become too hard and remain in the mouth when eaten.

sen.j: なお、イクラの皮は消化されにくいため、食物アレルギー源となりやすい蛋白質である。
sen.e: As the membrane of the salmon roe is difficult to digest, it is a protein likely to become an allergen.
As the membrane of the salmon roe is difficult to digest, it is a protein likely to become an allergen.
As the membrane of the salmon roe is difficult to digest, it is a protein likely to become an allergen.

sen.j: 北海道では秋の味覚として家庭で生筋子からイクラを作るが、その際には湯につけて手で丁寧に皮を取り除き、ばらこにする。
sen.e: In Hokkaido, families enjoy the taste of Fall by making ikura (salmon roe) from the sujiko, and they do this by putting the sujiko in hot water and carefully removing the membranes to make the 'barako' or loosened roe.

In Hokkaido, families enjoy the taste of Fall by making ikura (salmon roe) from the sujiko, and they do this by putting the sujiko in hot water and carefully removing the membranes to make the 'barako' or loosened roe.

In Hokkaido, families enjoy the taste of Fall by making ikura (salmon roe) from the sujiko, and they do this by putting the sujiko in hot water and carefully removing the membranes to make the 'barako' or loosened roe.

sen.j: 湯につけるため白く濁ってしまうがその後の工程でまた色が戻る。
sen.e: Putting the roe in hot water makes the color turn white however the color returns after further processing.
Putting the roe in hot water makes the color turn white however the color returns after further processing.
Putting the roe in hot water makes the color turn white however the color returns after further processing.

sen.j: 製造に際しては、過程で真水に触れてはならない。
sen.e: During manufacture, the roe must not come into contact with fresh water.
During manufacture, the roe must not come into contact with fresh water.
During manufacture, the roe must not come into contact with fresh water.

sen.j: 卵殻が硬化するので、海水かそれ以上の濃度の塩水を使うこと。
sen.e: The egg membrane will harden in fresh water so sea water or water even saltier than sea water is used.
The egg membrane will harden in fresh water so sea water or water even saltier than sea water is used.
The egg membrane will harden in fresh water so sea water or water even saltier than sea water is used.

sen.j: コレステロールが高いためか、日本以外ではイクラを食用とする地域はあまりない。
sen.e: There are not many regions in the world other than Japan that consume salmon roe as it contains a lot of cholesterol.
There are not many regions in the world other than Japan that consume salmon roe as it contains a lot of cholesterol.
There are not many regions in the world other than Japan that consume salmon roe as it contains a lot of cholesterol.

sen.j: 日本にイクラの製法を伝えたとされるロシアでも日本ほど日常食にはしていない。
sen.e: Even in Russia, which is the origin of the method of manufacture of salmon roe in Japan, people do not eat it as often as in Japan.
Even in Russia, which is the origin of the method of manufacture of salmon roe in Japan, people do not eat it as often as in Japan.
Even in Russia, which is the origin of the method of manufacture of salmon roe in Japan, people do not eat it as often as in Japan.

sen.j: これらの地域では、収穫された鮭の卵のほとんどが日本への輸出用に加工される。
sen.e: Most salmon roe harvested in these regions is processed for export to Japan.
Most salmon roe harvested in these regions is processed for export to Japan.
Most salmon roe harvested in these regions is processed for export to Japan.

sen.j: 資源を無駄にしないと言われているイヌイットでもイクラを食用とする習慣が無く、漁をしたその場でサケの卵は内臓と共に捨ててしまう。
sen.e: Even the Inuit, who are said not to waste any resources, do not have the custom of eating salmon roe and discard the roe together with the innards as soon as they have caught the fish.
Even the Inuit, who are said not to waste any resources, do not have the custom of eating salmon roe and discard the roe together with the innards as soon as they have caught the fish.
Even the Inuit, who are said not to waste any resources, do not have the custom of eating salmon roe and discard the roe together with the innards as soon as they have caught the fish.

sen.j: アメリカ合衆国、カナダは食用にはならないが、砂糖漬けの瓶詰めイクラが釣り餌として売られている。
sen.e: In the United States and Canada salmon roe is not eaten but is canned in sugar and sold as fish bait.
In the United States and Canada salmon roe is not eaten but is canned in sugar and sold as fish bait.
In the United States and Canada salmon roe is not eaten but is canned in sugar and sold as fish bait.

sen.j: 近年は欧米でも日本食ブームにより、寿司ネタの一種としてイクラが良く知られるようになって来た。
sen.e: In recent years Japanese food has experienced a boom in the United States and salmon roe has come to be well-known as a sushi topping.
In recent years Japanese food has experienced a boom in the United States and salmon roe has come to be well-known as a sushi topping.
In recent years Japanese food has experienced a boom in the United States and salmon roe has come to be well-known as a sushi topping.

sen.j: 一般的ではないがたまに高級食材としてスーパーなどにも保存性の良いイクラのパックが陳列されている。
sen.e: It is not common however packets of well preserved salmon roe can occasionally be found as delicacies at supermarkets.
It is not common however packets of well preserved salmon roe can occasionally be found as delicacies at supermarkets.
It is not common however packets of well preserved salmon roe can occasionally be found as delicacies at supermarkets.

sen.j: 人工イクラ（人造イクラ）
sen.e: Artificial salmon roe
Artificial salmon roe
Artificial salmon roe

sen.j: 現在では、収穫量の少ない天然物の代わりに、サラダ油と海草エキスを主原料とした人工イクラ（人造イクラ）も出回っている。
sen.e: These days, as the yield of natural salmon roe is insufficient, an alternative artificial salmon roe made from salad oil and seaweed extract available.
These days, as the yield of natural salmon roe is insufficient, an alternative artificial salmon roe made from salad oil and seaweed extract available.
These days, as the yield of natural salmon roe is insufficient, an alternative artificial salmon roe made from salad oil and seaweed extract available.

sen.j: 見た目、口当たり、味、ともに本物のイクラとほとんど見分けがつかないが、本物のイクラは熱湯をかけるとタンパク質が変化して表面が白く濁る。
sen.e: The look, texture and taste are virtually indistinguishable from the real salmon roe however the real salmon roe turns white when put in hot water due to changes in the protein.
The look, texture and taste are virtually indistinguishable from the real salmon roe however the real salmon roe turns white when put in hot water due to changes in the protein.
The look, texture and taste are virtually indistinguishable from the real salmon roe however the real salmon roe turns white when put in hot water due to changes in the protein.

sen.j: 生理的熱量が低いため、ダイエット食品としての利用もある。
sen.e: It is also used as a diet food as it is low calorie.
It is also used as a diet food as it is low calorie.
It is also used as a diet food as it is low calorie.

sen.j: 但し、その原料の一部であるカラギーナンは免疫系に悪影響を及ぼす事が指摘されている。
sen.e: However, one of the ingredients, carrageenan, has been identified as having an adverse affect on the immune system.
However, one of the ingredients, carrageenan, has been identified as having an adverse affect on the immune system.
However, one of the ingredients, carrageenan, has been identified as having an adverse affect on the immune system.
